dbDAO

Class BaseDB<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • dbDAO.BaseDB<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T -
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BaseHeir, CompList, CoupList, CustList

    public abstract class BaseDB<T>
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    This class is assigned to extract companies,coupons or customers from the DB this is an abstract class which has 2 methods for connect and return one abstract method and one execute method it similar works as a template method.
    Author:
    user
